original_text: The priests must give the money to the men who have authority over the work on the Lord's temple. Those leaders must pay the men who are doing the repairs.
korean_text: 여호와의 성전을 맡은 감독자의 손에 넘겨 그들이 여호와의 성전에 있는 작업자에게 주어 성전에 부숴진 것을 수리하게 하되

sentences.original_text: The priests must give the money
to the men who have authority
over the work on the Lord's temple
the men who are doing the repairs
